author: Moobeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: 2/28 PBE Update
text:
[This is a  W ORK  I N  P ROGRESS POST .] [ Status : The PBE is back up and online.]

The PBE has been updated! As we continue the 7.5 PBE cycle, tonight's update includes more tentative balance changes.

Continue reading for more information!

( Warning : PBE Content is tentative and subject to change - what you see below may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers at the end of the cycle! Manage your expectations accordingly.)

Table of Contents Skin Tweaks Balance Changes 
Skin Tweaks Small tweaks to Dragon Sorceress Zyra's passive and W seeds/eggs. Her passive's blue seeds are now thinner and W's seeds are a bit fatter

[ Passive Compare / W Compare ] 
Balance Changes *  Remember  *: The PBE is a testing grounds for new, tentative, and sometimes radical or experimental changes. Be aware that what you see below may be lacking context or other changes that didn't make it in or were implemented in an earlier patch this cycle! These are  not  official notes.

Masteries Bond of Stone Renamed to " Stoneborn Pact " due to effect rework testing this cycle.   Tooltip tweaked:  "Gain 5% total health.  Your crowd contro l  movement impairing effects brand enemy champions with an earthen rune for 4 seconds. Other ally allied champions who attack branded enemies heal for 5 + 2.5% of your maximum health over 2 seconds (halved if you are ranged)." 
Champions Jayce 
Shock Blast (Gun Q)  previous damage nerfs and mana cost increases reverted . Context . 
Items Blade of the Ruined King 
[ note : botrk has several changes from earlier update this cycle! ]
AD lowered from 45 to 40 Total price lowered from 3400 to 3300 Combine cost lowered from 900 to 800. 
Check out  [ THIS PAGE ]  for a  comprehensive list of the new content & changes currently on the PBE as a part of this cycle  or catch up with the individual update links below !
2/22 PBE Update: Dragon Sorceress Zyra, Dragonslayer Xin Zhao, New Chroma, New Ward skin, & more! 2/23 PBE Update: Demacia Summoner Icon, LotPK: Portal Party coming soon to PBE, & more! 2/24 PBE Update: Dragonslayer Xin Zhao and Dragon Sorceress Zyra splash, tentative balance changes, & more!  2/27 PBE Update: More tentative balance changes [ BACK TO TOP ]
